thread.title: Le Tissier: Abusers MUST be brought to justice
thread.title_full: Le Tissier: Abusers MUST be brought to justice | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Le Tissier: Abusers MUST be brought to justice

organizations.name: feb 2017 hampshire & isle of wight southampton

text:
Southampton legend Matt Le Tissier says his former teammates' bravery in speaking out about historic abuse at the club, has prompted him to help protect the next generation.
In the wake of the scandal, he's joining forces with the NSPCC as part of their Speak Out, Stay Safe campaign.
Rachel Hepworth joined him as he spoke to children at a Hampshire Primary school:
Play video Rachel also spoke to children at Halterworth Primary in Romsey and NSPCC coordinator Emma Aked.
The charity relies on volunteers and desperately needs to recruit more.
Click here for more information about how to get involved with the Speak Out, Stay Safe Campaign.
Last updated Fri 17 Feb 2017 Hampshire & Isle of Wight Southampton
